resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106713</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106713</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085910</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">French colonization and Vietnam wars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französische Besiedlung und Vietnam Kriege</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Colonisation et guerres de Vietnam françaises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colonização e guerras de Vietnam francesas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colonizzazione e guerre di Vietnam francesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλλικοί πόλεμοι αποίκισης και του Βιετνάμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colonización y guerras de Vietnam francesas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Photographs and text tell the story of Vietnam under French colonial rule, its experience during twentieth-century wars with France and the United States, and its recent liberalization.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotographien und Text erklären die Geschichte von
Vietnam unter französischer Kolonialrichtlinie, seiner Erfahrung 
während der Zwanzigstjahrhundert Kriege mit Frankreich und den 
Vereinigten Staaten und seiner neuen Liberalisierung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les photographies et le texte indiquent l'histoire
du Vietnam sous la règle coloniale française, son expérience 
pendant les guerres de vingtième-siècle avec la France et les 
Etats-Unis, et sa libéralisation récente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As fotografias e o texto dizem a história de 
Vietnam sob a régua colonial francesa, a sua experiência durante 
guerras de vigésimo-século com o France e os estados unidos, e seu 
liberalization recente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le fotografie ed il testo dicono alla storia del 
Vietnam secondo la regola coloniale francese, la relativa esperienza 
durante le guerre di ventesimo-secolo con la Francia ed uniti 
Dichiara e la relativa liberalizzazione recente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι φωτογραφίες και το κείμενο λένε την ιστορία του 
Βιετνάμ σύμφωνα με το γαλλικό αποικιακό κανόνα, την εμπειρία της
κατά τη διάρκεια πόλεμος εικοστός-αιώνα με τη Γαλλία και τις 
Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες, και την πρόσφατη φιλελευθεροποίησή της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las fotografías y el texto cuentan la historia de
Vietnam bajo regla colonial francesa, su experiencia durante guerras 
del vige'simo-siglo con Francia y los Estados Unidos, y su 
liberalización reciente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085910</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106713</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/french-colonization-and-vietnam-wars</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
